description: Located on the right side of the train tracks, this beautifully updated townhouse offers easy access in and out of Pitt Meadows without train delays. Perfect for a growing family, it features three bedrooms, a bright, renovated kitchen with stainless steel appliances, and a cozy gas fireplace ideal for relaxing evenings. The extra eating nook makes casual meals or morning coffee a pleasure.   Set in a family-oriented community, this home is close to shopping, the West Coast Express, and within the Highland Park Elementary and Pitt Meadows Secondary school catchments. This is a comfortable, well-located home ready for your next chapter.
